bibl.title: The Relationship between Roman and Local Law in the Babatha and Salome Komaise Archives. General Analysis and Three Case Studies on Law of Succession, Guardianship and Marriage. (Studies on the Texts of the Desert of Judah. 59.)
bibl.note: Ph.D. Rijksuniv. Groningen, 2005. - General Introduction. - Part One. The Law behind the Documents. External and Internal Evidence: Chapter One. Language; - Chapter Two. Language and References to Law; - Chapter Three: A New Approach to Understand the Relationship between Roman and Local Law in the Archives. - Part Two. The Law behind the Documents. Case Studies: Chapter Four. Law of Succession; - Chapter Five. Guardianship; - Chapter Six. Marriage. - Bibliography. Index.

OUDSHOORN Jacobine G., The Relationship between Roman and Local Law in the Babatha and Salome Komaise Archives. General Analysis and Three Case Studies on Law of Succession, Guardianship and Marriage. (Studies on the Texts of the Desert of Judah. 59.)
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2007, 8°, xiv-456 pp. ISBN 978-90-04-14974-8. €149.
